name: Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Bane of the Family Collector's Edition
description: Return to the De la Fer estate to help the count unravel the curse that has been passed down through his family!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 711 MB available space
